import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Star, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'; const About = () => (
{/* Decorative Floating Stars */}
{/* Header */} About Me {/* Story */}

I’m Atharv Puranik, an engineering student and AI/ML innovator. I built a custom LLM from scratch—mastering tokenizer design and complex math engines—to power cutting-edge language solutions.

My full-stack playground includes React.js,{' '} Tailwind CSS, TypeScript,{' '} Node.js, and Express. I deploy robust AI pipelines with TensorFlow,{' '} PyTorch, and AWS services—backed by four AWS Academy certifications.

{/* Skills & Certs */}

Core Expertise

    {[ 'React.js', 'Tailwind CSS', 'TypeScript', 'Python', 'Flask & Streamlit', 'Node.js & Express', 'MongoDB', 'AWS Cloud', 'TensorFlow', 'PyTorch', 'NLP & Generative AI', 'Git & GitHub' ].map(skill => (
  • {skill}
    • ))}

AWS Academy Certifications

  • Cloud Foundations
  • Cloud Architecting
  • Intro to Generative AI
  • ML Foundations
{/* Decorative Border */}
); export default About;
